title: Alesha Dixon and husband Azuka Ononye dote on newborn daughter Anaya at Santa Monica Pier
text:
She and her husband Azuka Ononye secretly welcomed their second daughter, Anaya, just seven weeks ago.

And Alesha Dixon appeared completely besotted with her newborn as they enjoyed a fun-filled family outing alongside dancer Azuka and their eldest child Azura, six, at the Santa Monica Pier earlier this week.

The Britain's Got Talent judge, 41 - who is currently in California to film the American edition of the competition series - opted for an uncharacteristically dressed down appearance as she doted on Anaya during their trip to the funfair.

Family first: Alesha Dixon and her husband Azuka Ononye treated their newborn Anaya and eldest child Azura, six, to a trip to Santa Monica Pier earlier this week

The former Mis-Teeq musician put on a casual display as she sported patterned joggers and a sleeveless Ivy Park vest ontop of a vibrant halterneck bralet.

Strolling along the pier, the Breathe Slow hitmaker complemented her low-key look with a pair of beige flip-flops, which she removed during a lively ride with Azura.

The honey-blonde beauty swept her tresses into a sleek bun to display her naturally bronzed complexion, and shielded her eyes in circular-framed shades.

Presenter Alesha appeared in great spirits as she enjoyed a break from her judging duties during a sun-soaked walk with her nearest and dearest.

Besotted: The Britain's Got Talent judge, 41, opted for an uncharacteristically dressed down appearance as she doted on Anaya, seven weeks, during their trip to the funfair

In good company: The presenter beamed with delight as she enjoyed some time on a thrilling ride with Azura

Big kid at heart: The media personality was in her element as she waved her arms in the air

Less is more: The former Mis-Teeq musician put on a casual display as she sported patterned joggers and a sleeveless Ivy Park vest ontop of a vibrant halterneck bralet

Special moments: Host Alesha appeared in great spirits as she enjoyed a break from her judging duties during a sun-soaked walk with her nearest and dearest

How sweet: The former Strictly judge couldn't contain her delight as she cuddled Anaya

Earlier in the week, Alesha said she felt like the 'luckiest girl on the planet' as she shared the first photo of her seven-week-old daughter Anaya.

In her confirmation message shared with her Instagram followers, she wrote: 'Anaya Safiya born 20.08.19. 7 weeks ago this little angel came into our lives! As I celebrate my birthday today I feel like the luckiest girl on the planet.'

The Hertfordshire native confirmed she was expecting her second child with Azuka in May, during an appearance on Britain’s Got Talent.

Off they go: Strolling along the pier, the Breathe Slow hitmaker complemented her low-key look with a pair of beige flip-flops, while dancer Azuka went shirless

Family of four: The couple secretly welcomed their second daughter just seven weeks ago

Brief break: The Hertfordshire native is currently in California to film the American edition of the competition series

Taking to the stage during the first live show of the series, the media personality revealed her prominent baby bump in a form-fitting dress.

Her announcement was pre-empted by hosts Ant McPartlin and Declan Donnelly, who referenced to her pregnancy in a Morcambe and Wise style opening skit.

Alesha later enthused she was ecstatic to be expecting her second child with her husband. 'It's a lovely place to celebrate it,' she said, gesturing to the audience gathered inside London's Hammersmith Apollo.

Bundle of joy: Earlier in the week, Alesha said she felt like the 'luckiest girl on the planet' as she shared the first photo of her seven-week-old daughter Anaya

The TV star had previously confessed she felt 'so much more relaxed' in her second pregnancy.

She gushed during an appearance on Loose Women: 'I feel great actually, I feel so much more relaxed this time around. It's great the first time around you read every single book going and the second time you're like, "I've got this."

'Azura is amazing, she's doing really well and kisses me every day and making sure everything's okay. She's so excited, beyond excited.'
description: The BGT judge, 41, stepped out with her newborn, seven weeks, as they enjoyed an outing alongside Azuka, 39, and their eldest child Azura, six, at the Santa Monica Pier earlier this week.
